short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouZen blocks suggested videos on YouTube, so users can focus on the content they actually want to watch with a clean look!.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
As someone who uses YouTube for both work and studies, I understand the struggle of getting caught in a rabbit hole of suggested videos. That's why I created this extension - to help users stay focused and on track while using YouTube.

Hides suggested videos, so users can focus on the content they actually want to watch.
